content.question:
A coffeepot has the shape of a cylinder with radius 5 inches, as shown in the figure above. Let h be the depth of the coffee in the pot, measured in inches, where h is a function of time t, measured in seconds. The volume V of coffee in the pot is changing at the rate of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mi>π</mi> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DAC@</annotation> </semantics> </math> cubic inches per second. (The volume V of a cylinder with radius r and height h is <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>V</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>π</mi> <msup> <mi>r</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FB0@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.) 

(a) Show that <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

frqParts.text:
A coffeepot has the shape of a cylinder with radius 5 inches, as shown in the figure above. Let h be the depth of the coffee in the pot, measured in inches, where h is a function of time t, measured in seconds. The volume V of coffee in the pot is changing at the rate of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mi>π</mi> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DAC@</annotation> </semantics> </math> cubic inches per second. (The volume V of a cylinder with radius r and height h is <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>V</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>π</mi> <msup> <mi>r</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FB0@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.) 

(a) Show that <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

(b) Given that h = 17 at time t = 0, solve the differential equation <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msqrt> <mi>h</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <mn>5</mn> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4153@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for h as a function of t.
(c) At what time t is the coffeepot empty?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
